email_body: I'm sorry but I have plans for Thursday already. Maybe next time. John James_Naughton@em.fcnbd.com on 09/26/2000 01:45:42 PM To: "John Arnold" <John.Arnold@enron.com> cc: Subject: John, I have tentative plans to be in Houston on Thursday. If, as we discussed yesterday, you have time to get out after work, I'd like to get together. Please let me know if this works for you and I'll confirm my plans to be there. Thanks, Jim Naughton
